// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class DecoratorAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SelectorNode(new GuardNode(() => this.IsAlive, new SequenceNode(
            new IfNode(() => (this.IsEnemyVisible && (!this.IsFleeing)), new TimeoutNode(5f, new ActionNode(() => this.Attack(this.Target), "Attack(.Target)")), new ActionNode(() => this.Patrol(), "Patrol()")),
            new RepeatNode(3, new ActionNode(() => this.TauntEnemy(), "TauntEnemy()")),
            new CooldownNode(2.5f, new ActionNode(() => this.UseAbility(), "UseAbility()")),
            new WhileNode(() => (this.Stamina > 0), new ActionNode(() => this.Sprint(), "Sprint()")),
            new InvertNode(new ConditionNode(() => this.IsStunned, ".IsStunned")))));
    }
}
